LanguageData.GTEar.label: cybernetic bionic ear
LanguageData.GTEar.description: An installed the advanced version of the bionic ear. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.
LanguageData.ArchotechEye.label: cybernetic bionic eye
LanguageData.ArchotechEye.description: An installed the advanced version of the bionic eye. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces.
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.label: cybernetic bionic arm
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.description: An installed the second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible strength. You may destroy your opponents limbs in a fist fight...not recomended for wardens.
LanguageData.ArchotechArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: fist
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.label: cybernetic bionic leg
LanguageData.ArchotechLeg.description: An installed the second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Give the owner incredible speed
LanguageData.GTHeart.label: cybernetic heart
LanguageData.GTHeart.description: An installed powerful cardiac augmentation, replacing standard human hearts. Safely manages very high blood flow without overwhelming standard body parts.
LanguageData.GTLung.label: cybernetic lung
LanguageData.GTLung.description: An installed powerful vascular augmentation, replacing standard human lungs. The perfect pairing with a cybernetic heart, this increases circulatory speed, increasing efficiency.
LanguageData.GTKidney.label: cybernetic kidney
LanguageData.GTKidney.description: An installed powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human kidneys. Increasing blood filtration efficiency.
LanguageData.GTLiver.label: cybernetic liver
LanguageData.GTLiver.description: An installed powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human livers. Increasing blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency.
LanguageData.GTStomach.label: cybernetic stomach
LanguageData.GTStomach.description: An installed powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human stomachs. Increasing digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency.
LanguageData.GTHand.label: cybernetic bionic hand
LanguageData.GTHand.description: An installed powerful abdominal augmentation, replacing standard human stomachs. Increasing digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency.
LanguageData.GTFoot.label: cybernetic bionic foot
LanguageData.GTFoot.description: An installed the second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of leg upgrades, just replacing feet.
LanguageData.GTDentures.label: cybernetic jaw implant
LanguageData.GTDentures.description: An installed the second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano machinery to break down food instantly with minimal effort.
LanguageData.GTSpine.label: cybernetic bionic spine
LanguageData.GTSpine.description: An installed the most crucial part of the human body improved with the best available nano materials. Greatly imroved manipulation and movement.
